p: Convincingly, there are innumerable herbs that have been shown to have a strong anti-VRI activity. These plants show direct antiviral activity (Glycyrrhiza spp), acts as analgesic ( Calendula officinalis), anti-inflammatory ( Hedera helix), immune stimulator ( Andrographis paniculate). Notably important antiviral herbs from important families include Lomatium dissectum (desert parsley), and Osmorhiza occidentalis (western sweet Cicely) from family Apiaceae, Rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary), and Prunella vulgaris (heal-all) from family Lamiaceae ( Yarnell 2017).
